Text: FREE DVDs for weeksAttention Rent as many DVDs as you want FREE for the next weeks IMAGE Tired of video store hassles The poor selection the lines the late fees Try a better way to rent DVDs Rent DVDs online from Netflix Click Here for the FREE TRIAL Its easy Create a list online of movies you want to see Netflix has the worlds largest selection of DVDs Netflix sends you the first three movies from your list in two to four days via firstclass mail No due dates and no late fees means you can keep them as long as you want Have up to three on hand When youre done watching one send it back in its prepaid envelope and Netflix will send you another from your list Netflixcom See for yourself Right now Netflix is offering a FREE TRIAL of their service Click Here Free trial offer expires The following message was sent to you as an optin subscriber to eScriptions We will continue to bring you valuable offers on the products and services that interest you most If you wish to unsubscribe please click here Unsubscribe IMAGE
